title: Watermelon in a dream for a single woman and the interpretation of the dream about eating watermelon by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Watermelon in a dream for a single womanWatermelon is considered one of the delicious summer fruits that adults and children prefer to eat due to the high temperature. It is also a light food that contains a lot of fiber. If a girl sees watermelon in her dream and buys it and eats it, it indicates some of its problems, which we will highlight below. A dream about watermelon for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Watermelon in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for an unmarried woman indicates that the age of marriage has been delayed for her and that she is likely to wait for her partner for some time, because the proposals that she proposes marriage to are not appropriate at all. If she sees If the girl saw that her fiancé gave her a watermelon in a dream and she was very happy, this means that there are disagreements in her love life that may appear to her, but she will succeed in overcoming them quickly, God willing. But if she took this watermelon from someone she did not know before, this indicates her marriage. A close relationship with a man who wants to make her happy and bring her comfort and security because of his love for her while she is unaware of it. If a girl finds a large watermelon in her dream, the interpretation shows her a happy marriage, thanks to the husband’s high practical and social level, knowing that eating green watermelon indicates the psychological comfort that comes to her with this fiancé. A dream about watermelon for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin, claims Ibn You will see that seeing watermelon in a dream for a girl only means that she will get married, but after a period of time has passed, that is, it may be a little late, while eating watermelon in a dream is an auspicious topic for the girl. Happy marriage, God willing. Ibn Sirin says: One of the indications of seeing a large watermelon is that it is evidence of a lack of interest in health and eating some harmful foods that lead to fatigue and weakening of health, God forbid. If a girl sees that she is buying a watermelon and offering it to a member of her family, the interpretation promises her Beautiful things will come to her from this person to change old circumstances for the better in her reality. Ibn Sirin warns her if she sees red watermelon of some conflicts that will fall upon her that will likely make her make mistakes in her life and regret them, while red watermelon from an emotional standpoint indicates her prosperity and greatness. She enjoys joy with her fiancé or lover. An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Eating watermelon in a dream for a single woman. Eating watermelon in a dream indicates many indications of Unmarried women, according to its taste and color. Dream experts show that it is an expression of attachment to someone you trust a lot and you see that he makes life easier with him, which means that he is a good person and does not have many complications in his life in something special like education or work. Eating red watermelon In a dream for a single woman, the meaning of eating red watermelon in a dream is divided among the girl according to her taste and admiration for it. If she finds that its taste is beautiful and she eats it a lot, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a black leather jacket in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a black leather jacket in a dream. Some people may search for an interpretation of a dream about wearing a black leather jacket in a dream. One of the dreams that many want to know is the interpretation of this vision. Let us learn about its interpretation by some diligent commentators, and let the reader know that it is the jurisprudence of scholars. The site is not in interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of wearing a black leather jacket in a dream. A black leather jacket in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees himself wearing a black jacket, this may indicate Good news has arrived to the dreamer these days, and God knows best. If you see yourself wearing a black leather jacket in a dream, this may indicate success at work or study, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing yourself wearing a leather jacket in a dream indicates positive changes that will happen to the dreamer. In his life and during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting cloth in a dream: Cutting cloth in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer these days, and God knows best. It is possible to see cutting cloth in a dream indicates the good changes that will occur to the vision during this period. By the grace of God. Seeing pieces of cloth in a dream may indicate happy events that will happen to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a piece of cloth in a dream indicates the end of the worries and sorrows of the dreamer’s life during this period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about goat skin in a dream can That goat skin in a dream indicates perseverance and the desire to achieve desires and dreams. Seeing goat skin in a dream may mean that he is holding on to something strongly during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing goat skin in a dream indicates the presence of some elements and people that greatly influenced him. During this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about taking a jacket from someone in a dream: Wearing a jacket from someone in a dream can indicate good health, thanks to God. If she sees a jacket from another person in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in her life. During this period, and God knows best. Seeing taking a jacket from another person in a dream may indicate the stability of the family and the family that they enjoy a lot during this time. If you see a jacket from another person in a dream, this may indicate an improvement in the financial and social situation in those days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about washing wool with someone in a dream: Washing wool in a dream with another person may indicate the blessing of money and the ample life that you enjoyed in those days. Perhaps seeing washing wool in a dream indicates the morals of a wise man, and God knows best. A dream about washing and cleaning wool may indicate that he A charitable man disburses zakat and alms from his money. A dream about washing wool in a dream may indicate that he heard happy news or good events coming to him at this time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about small fish

preview.html: This is what we will learn in this article from our translator, in the case of single and married women, men, pregnant women, and young men. We also explain the opinion of some interpreters of this vision. The interpretation of seeing a small fish in a dream for a single girl. The interpretation of seeing a small fish in a dream for an unmarried girl varies according to the dream’s condition and the fortuneteller: If a girl dreams If an unmarried girl is cleaning a small fish, the vision indicates that she is involved in a lot of debt. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream buying a small fish shows her ability to achieve her dream. Seeing a single girl in a dream buying a small fish indicates a delay in her relationship. As you can see in Her sleep is an unmarried girl, while she helps her mother clean the fish. The vision showed her love and help for others. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream, giving fish to someone as a gift, means her marriage to someone she loves. An unmarried girl seeing a small fish on her way, is an unpleasant vision. Where the vision shows that the means of livelihood are few and limited. A single girl seeing in her dream that someone is giving her a small fish. The vision indicated her relationship with a good person in the coming period. For an unmarried girl who catches a small fish in her dream, the vision means the loss of sorrows and problems. Watch. Also: A married woman’s dream of fishing. Interpretation of seeing a dream about a small fish in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees a small fish in a dream, this indicates a lot of nourishment. A married woman seeing a small fish in a dream while cleaning it. This means that poverty and distress will go away from her life. And that God will grant her great wealth. A married woman who sees a small fish in her dream means a change in her upcoming life for the better. Selling small fish in a married woman’s dream indicates crises in her future life. When a married woman sees a small fish in her bed, the vision means that she She is afflicted with a disease. A married woman sees a small fish but a large quantity in her house. The vision indicated that she will become pregnant in the next few days. A small and multiple fish in a married woman’s dream indicates happiness and love for her family. A married woman who sees a small fish swimming in the water means that her life It will change for the better. Or she dreams of a married woman buying a small fish. The vision means that she will become pregnant and give birth to a female. Interpretation of seeing a small fish in a dream about a man and its meaning. The interpretation of seeing fish in a man’s dream varies according to his condition and appearance: When a man sees a fish in a dream, but it is cooked, the vision indicates To happy news. If a man sees fish spread across his bed, this means his distance and separation from his wife. Seeing a man in a dream with fish scattered on the road. It means that he is going through a difficult period, which may be a financial crisis or failure in a project. A married man who sees small fish announced Filling his house means that he is going through a difficult period of stress and anxiety. Buying a lot of fish in a man’s dream indicates a lot of sustenance and blessings. Either the unpleasant vision in the man’s dream is his vision of dead fish. The vision shows his failure to achieve the desired desire.

title: Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman. God created the universe with creativity, and made every creature a life to walk in it. Clouds are water and snow, and when the clouds are heavy and fall on the ground in the form of rain, what is the interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream? Interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream: Seeing clouds is one of the visions that bodes well. Clouds bring goodness by dropping rain or snow on the surface of the Earth. Kindness prevails, plants grow and animals are watered. Therefore, seeing clouds in a dream bodes well: Seeing clouds in a dream means that a person is strong in faith, adheres to his religion, and knows his decisions. Also, an unmarried girl will get engaged soon when she sees clouds in her dream. Likewise, a married woman will enjoy many good things that she will enjoy. For her and her family if she sees clouds in her dream. Moreover, God bless her pregnancy soon. Also, a pregnant woman will give birth easily and smoothly if she sees clouds in her dream. She will also enjoy an easy pregnancy without any problems and without exposure to diseases. In addition, the man becomes A prestigious position and he will achieve his ambitions if he sees clouds in his dream. As long as the young man is single, he will get engaged and get married soon when he sees clouds in his dream. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a geyser in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing white clouds. God considers clouds food and goodness, because they carry rain within them. And the good things that prevail on earth. Seeing white clouds means that the dreamer is aware of the new events that are occurring in his life. It also indicates that the dreamer will achieve his dreams and goals in life. Also, an unmarried girl will get married soon when she sees white clouds in her dream. Moreover, A married woman will be blessed by God with a pregnancy soon if she sees white clouds in her dream. Also, a pregnant woman will go through an easy and easy birth process when she sees white clouds in her dream. In addition, the person who dreams the dream will suffer from some minor fears when he sees that white clouds are approaching him. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see evidence in a dream or a dream in detail. You dream of holding clouds in your hand. It is considered that holding something in your hand is something, meaning that it was obtained and made in your hands. Likewise, the clouds that you hold in the hand indicate the possession of the great goodness and strength that is present in the clouds. Clouds are considered a source of goodness and blessing for God’s creatures: Seeing a path of clouds in a dream means abundant goodness that the dreamer will receive. It also indicates the fulfillment of one’s dreams and the achievement of one’s goals. Likewise, if an unmarried girl dreams that she is holding clouds, then she will soon free her mother and marry a good man. Then Whoever sees in a dream that he is catching clouds and eating from them, God will give him a lot of money and food. God also makes the condition of the one who sees that he is catching clouds and gathering them and reaching a high position in knowledge. It also indicates the supernatural intelligence of the one who dreams that he is holding clouds and pressing on them until he falls. Rain on him. In addition, catching clouds in a dream indicates a person’s piety and devotion to his religion. While whoever

title: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Seeing a lover in a dream is one of the most common dreams that many people have. It is one of the common dreams and has many possibilities. It can express goodness and sustenance for its owner, or distress and division. It can also indicate the problems that the person with the vision will face, and it can indicate psychological problems that affect the person with the vision, such as a feeling of isolation, loneliness, and being away from people. Many scholars have worked hard to explain these visions, such as Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. Read also: Seeing a promise In a dream: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream by Al-Osaimi for a girl - Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream by Al-Osaimi - Seeing a lover in a girl’s dream carries many indications and connotations and varies depending on the condition of the lover or confidant, and Al-Osaimi interpreted it. Below we take into consideration the interpretation of seeing a dream about your lover in Al-Osaimi’s dream for a girl. Seeing your lover smiling and happy indicates happy circumstances or the girl’s connection with the one she loves. It was also interpreted as expressing the girl’s inner feeling of loneliness and her need for support and support. The lover’s betrayal was interpreted as anguish and anguish for the girl and problems that would come to her life. Seeing the beloved after the absence of a good sign of the girl’s imminent arrival in what she aspires to and dreams of, it was also interpreted as a harbinger of change To improve her life, improve her life, and remove problems. And worries. Seeing your beloved with another girl suggests that the dreamer will be exposed to major problems in her life. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing your beloved in a man’s dreamInterpretations of seeing your beloved in a dream vary according to her shape and appearance, and Al-Osaimi’s interpretations of her are as follows. Seeing your beloved happy is interpreted as coming to the man Joy and happiness or good news about the imminent arrival of God’s sustenance to him or a promotion at work. Seeing someone you love sad indicates anxiety, problems, anxiety in life, and a feeling of distress. Seeing a dear person in a dream can indicate feelings of loneliness, isolation, and difficulty interacting with the people around you, It also indicates excessive thinking about the future and anxiety about what is to come. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing a lover in a woman’s dream Seeing a lover in the company of another girl is interpreted as a sign of financial problems and distress, and it is also interpreted as a sign of separation from the husband from the wife. Seeing a lover in a woman’s dream can indicate happiness and joy that will knock on the door of the house. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi’s interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream carries many aspects and indicators that vary depending on the shape and appearance of the lover. Most interpretations of seeing a dear person in a dream show the goodness that It affects the family, happiness, and emotion, and carries within it many meanings of love, a feeling of comfort, and the removal of worries and anxiety. Seeing a loved one sad indicates distress, pain, and problems that the dreamer will face, as this can indicate a feeling of loneliness and loss of connection in life. A dream about a loved one is interpreted Which is followed as an imminent fulfillment of the desires and dreams that the visionary wants

title: Interpretation of the dream of wearing black in a dream in detail

preview.html: In this article, we will provide you with an interpretation of a dream about wearing black in a dream. In most cases, wearing a black dress is actually a symbol of grief over the loss of someone, and there are those who prefer to wear it because it is one of the most elegant colors in clothing, but what about the interpretation of seeing it worn in a dream? Many people feel anxious and confused when they see themselves wearing black for fear that this dream is a bad omen for them. In the encyclopedia, we will learn about the interpretation of wearing black in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about wearing black in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Wearing black in a dream The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of wearing black clothes generally symbolizes that the dreamer suffers from sorrows and worries in his life. Whoever dreams that he is wearing a black robe and is already sick, his dreams indicate that his illness is difficult to recover from. The dream in which he was wearing black fur indicates that the dreamer was jealous of someone close to him, and seeing it here is a warning to him to be careful. If a person dreams of wearing a black dress in mourning for a dead person in reality, this means that this dead person needs alms due to his many sins. The dream of the dreamer’s desire to wear black may indicate that God Almighty will achieve for the dreamer all the goals he wants in his life. Wearing black in a dream for a single woman The dream of wearing black clothes in an unmarried woman’s dream is a good dream, because it shows that God will help her in her personal and professional life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wearing a black dress, her vision indicates her poor psychological state as a result of the failure of her emotional relationship. As for if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is wearing Black shoes, this indicates her high status among people, and that she will be able to reach a high position. A single woman's dream of wearing black in mourning for a dead person indicates her failure in one of the matters that led to feelings of anxiety and loneliness. One of the promising visions for an unmarried woman is to dream of wearing a black jacket, because it is a sign that God Almighty will give her a righteous husband and good morals. One of the visions that have been well interpreted is a married woman's dream of wearing elegant black clothes, because it is a sign that she enjoys good luck and achieves everything she wants. A married woman's dream of wearing a black cloak indicates that there are differences between her and her husband and that her marital life is characterized by instability. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wearing a black veil, her dream indicates her closeness to God and doing many good deeds. A married woman who wears a black scarf in a dream symbolizes that the woman is distinguished by her responsibility, purity and chastity. title: Interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing pet dogs in a dream: Many people like to see pet dogs in a dream, as a result of their love for dogs in reality, as some want to raise them inside the home and provide them with food. About tracking him, follow us on the Dream Interpretation Secrets website. Seeing pet dogs in a dream Seeing pet dogs in a dream portends goodness and victory for the sleeper, especially if there are enemies around him and he sees a group of pet dogs, as their presence confirms the happy days that the person will spend and get rid of most of his enemies. This dream may also indicate a large amount of money and abundance in one's life soon. Commentators emphasize the many good things that the sleeper accumulates in his life and the great ambitions that he soon achieves when he sees a group of pet dogs, especially if they have a beautiful shape, and the dream can To demonstrate a feeling of joy and reassurance with the family. Happy near you. Seeing pet dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A person may see a lot of pet dogs in his dream, and Ibn Sirin expects this to be a sure sign of happiness and happy days. A person or someone close to the family. You may find a pet dog in your dream, but you are surprised that it is getting wild in a bad way and trying to attack you, hence it is a sign of serious harm and bad intent that someone is giving you. Expect him to be an honest man, but he has extreme cunning and bad behavior through which he will hurt you. Seeing pet dogs in a dream for a single woman Seeing pet dogs in a girl’s dream has many dimensions. If it is gray, it is a warning sign, as it foretells that she will be exposed to many problems in her life and they may arise due to the grave injustice inflicted on her by some people, and that malice may come. So she prays to God Almighty to save her from this bad time that she is likely to go through. Sometimes the girl finds in a dream that there are pet dogs, but they become bad and try to attack them. This indicates the deception and lies that some people conspire against and may be close to. It is necessary to avoid evil and corrupt people so as not to be deceived by their good and unrealistic appearance. Seeing white dogs in a dream for a single woman. Seeing white dogs in one girl’s vision can prove some beautiful things emotionally, as the person tries to get close to her in the future and asks her family to marry, which means that dogs White brings beautiful meanings and kindness to the sentimentality of life, besides it can be a sign of happy news or the presence of a joyful event. Seeing black dogs in a dream for an unmarried woman. Experts do not expect black dogs in a woman’s dream to be beautiful signs, but rather indicate that someone is trying He can deceive her and lie to her, and he can deceive her and get close to her and show his intense love for her, but he is a disabled person. She has an unfair character that will hurt her a lot and cause her a lot of harm in her life. Interpretation of a dream about brown dogs for pets for individuals: It is possible that pet dogs appear in a girl’s dream and are brown in color.

title: Here is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of eating grilled fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of eating grilled fishInterpretation of eating grilled fishIn a dream, there are dreams whose interpretations differ from one person to another, where interpretations are set according to a group of controlling factors, including gender, age, marital status, and others. Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen the scholar Ibn Sirin put a number of different interpretations in The interpretation of eating grilled fish, which we see varies from one person to another, and among them we mention these interpretations: Ibn Sirin explains that seeing fish in general in a dream in large and infinite quantities is evidence of goodness, blessing, and abundant food that will soon come to the dreamer. If a man sees in a dream a small number Of fish, from two to four, then based on the number of fish he saw, he will marry this number of women, whether it is two, three, or four. Whoever sees that he is catching fish, then thinks about the river or sea from which he is fishing, this is evidence of... Goodness and livelihood that the dreamer obtains. If the fish is brown, this indicates a successful and prosperous partnership in the life and work of the visionary. Whoever sees that he is buying fish from the market, this is evidence that he will buy a slave girl, but if he buys fish from anywhere other than the market, then he will get married soon. Grilled fish in a dream. This vision, especially for the sunfish, indicates various interpretations related to the dreamer’s life and future, and among these interpretations, the Mokhtilaun website states the following: If the dreamer sees in a dream that the sky is raining large quantities of grilled fish, then this The vision indicates that the dreamer’s prayers will be answered. But if the dreamer is a student completing his studies and sees grilled fish in his dream, then this vision is evidence of a journey to complete his studies and search for knowledge. Generally grilled fish in the dream indicates an improvement in the financial condition for a better livelihood and profit for the pioneer. If The dreamer ate grilled fish in a dream, as this is a sign of kindness and livelihood that the dreamer will soon gain. Interpretation of eating grilled fish for a single woman: As for single girls, this vision differs greatly, as their interpretations are closely related to their future life in study, work, love life, and marriage, and among these interpretations we mention: Seeing fried fish in unmarried girls means that she talks much more and excessively than she makes promises and makes promises to her relatives and parents without fulfilling them. In some other interpretations, we see that seeing fried fish in a dream for single girls indicates perseverance in achieving the goals and desires that they set in their plans. Future. If an unmarried girl sees grilled fish in front of her eyes and up close, this vision is a sign that she will soon live a wide and abundant life. Seeing an unmarried girl in the same dream catching a fish from the sea indicates a misunderstanding of many things, leading to some Negative consequences. Seeing grilled fish in a married woman’s dream. As for the interpretation of eating grilled fish in a married woman’s dream, this vision is closely related to

Why does squid dream? The interpretation of seeing squid in a dream is complete. A whole squid in a dream is one of the desired visions, which indicates great benefits and knowledge. Seeing a whole squid in a dream is a sign that the dreamer enjoys a high status, gets a good job, and fame is beneficial to him. A squid in a dream indicates relief from needs, stopping worries and problems, And get rid of the haters. Seeing that you are buying a whole squid in a dream means that you will reap a lot of good food and the dreamer will get a lot of useful things. The squid in a dream is whole for a general woman. The interpretation of seeing a whole squid in a dream for a general woman is evidence of happiness, joy, and the fulfillment of desires and goals. As Seeing an unmarried woman eating squid in a dream is a good sign of her engagement and marriage to a young man who holds a high position in society. Seeing squid in a dream whole and fishing is evidence that an unmarried girl will achieve success and prosperity in academic and professional life. Squid in a dream of a married womanSeeing a woman A married woman eating a whole squid in a dream testifies to the goodness and generosity that she and her family will enjoy, God willing. Also, seeing a husband giving his wife a squid in a camel dream indicates that he will soon provide her with a pregnancy and a good heir. Why dream of squid in a dream filled with a married woman with desirable visions It speaks of the end of worries and problems and the high status of her husband and children. Squid in a dream is fully pregnant. Eating whole squid in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of recovery from illness and improvement of circumstances and condition. Also, seeing squid in a dream indicates an easy birth. A pregnant woman can give birth to a child who has a high status. And a high status. Seeing a whole squid in a dream that was bought from the market, says that she and her husband will have useful and beautiful things to receive. Why do you dream of eating a whole squid in a dream? Eating squid in a dream is full of visions that indicate the recovery of the patient, the cessation of sadness, and relief from his worries, and this is evidence of Support and kindness. In the same way, seeing squid in a dream eaten whole, and its taste was wonderful, is a sign of blessing, a happy life, and hearing good news. Seeing squid caught in a dream is whole. For the poor, it is evidence of wealth and abundance of money, and for the sick, it is a cure for diseases, And for those who care about it, it is a disaster relief and rescue wave. title: Interpretation of applying cool in a dream Seeing cool in a dream

preview.html: A dream about kohl for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman and a man by wearing kohl and makeup, attracting attention with black kohl, and buying kohl from Ibn Sirin and the Imam. - Sadiq and others: Eyeliner in a dream is one of the strange dreams that we see in a different way in our dreams, which causes us great anxiety because we see it in a dream, as is the case for most people who see the dream in a dream. Women because of the frequent use of kohl in reality, and kohl is one of the types of makeup present in our lives. Then we review in our article that we present to you today the interpretation of seeing each eye in a dream, which was explained to us by the great commentator Ibn Sirin, who explained it to us in full. The interpretation of eye kohl in a dream. The eye is money, and if It was for light, so it indicates the claim of Saladin, and if it was for the sake of adornment, then it is explained by the righteousness of its appearance. And internal corruption. It is said that clothes indicate betrayal and prestige for men and women, and it is said that clothes indicate the right path, especially if they are worn without exaggeration. Whoever sees that he is immersed in antimony, then marries a woman, and whoever sees that he came with kohl, this is interpreted in four ways. : A good eye, good religion, earning money, and increasing beauty. Kohl in a dream means money and increasing insight into justice, and whoever sees that he is given kohl in his hand will win money, whether it is a little or a lot. If a black man applies kohl, then he is not well, and whoever sees that he has come With a kohl for his action, he corrects his religion, and if he is blind, then it is his misfortune. If a virgin takes a kohl, she will get married and so will a widow, and a kohl with blood and ashes is a sin and an invalid marriage. Money, a woman’s kohl, and a kohl is desirable for a righteous man, but undesirable for a sinful man, and a tendency is a child. It was said that kohl indicates increased light of sight. Interpretation of kohl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing kohl in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that good news is coming to her. Kohl in a single woman’s dream is evidence that her life is going smoothly. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing black hair in a dream Evidence that her ambitions will come true. Seeing her unmarried girl being masculine in a dream is evidence that she will meet a woman of great wisdom who will help her a lot. Seeing a girl applying eyeliner to herself in a dream is evidence that goodness is coming her way. A girl applying eyeliner in a dream Evidence that she married a person she loves very much in life. A married woman who sees eyeliner in a dream is evidence of her upcoming livelihood in the near future. Seeing a married woman in a dream with eyeliner is evidence that she will meet a woman who will help her a lot in all matters of her life. Seeing a married woman Wearing black hair in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness or the cessation of anxiety. Seeing a married woman taking kohl from the hands of someone she does not know is evidence that she is blessed with money. Seeing a pregnant woman suffering from colic in a dream indicates that she will live on the street. Cole in a dream is evidence of Someone's next big money. To dream of a pregnant woman with kohlrabi is evidence that childbirth will be easy and she will not face any obstacles. Vision
